data.message: That was the year one of my daughter's was born; Casandra...😃😘and also the year one of my bff's was 😥🔫...rip Joe. Talk about a time warp for real!

replies.message: Jennifer, my buddy and I just toasted a drink in your friend, Joe's memory. I'm glad you have your daughter to bring you happiness, while dealing with the loss of your best friend. Even though it was over a decade ago, I know it remains close to you. I lost my dear friend, Colin in 03. Think about him whenever I hear Em's music. Time to warp indeed. Have a great life. Make it count!
